nodes.text: The kid will be cured of depression.
when that belly rumbles and a chill creeps up there will be no more depression. That need to survive will kick in and that will be it.
The kid will be cold and hungry.
It will probably take at least two days
If the kid spends at least two days out in the woods he or she will be hungry or cold.
the kid won't think your serious
take the kid 20 miles into the woods with a map compass and trail markers and tell that kid to walk due east to a camp with food shelter and a two way radio.
If the kid doesn't think you are serious and is told to travel 20 miles to a camp on foot it will probably take at least two days for him to arrive at the camp..
